metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7051 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: XmlMapper in the Jackson XML dataformat component (aka jackson-dataformat-xml) before 2.7.8 and 2.8.x before 2.8.4 allows remote attackers to conduct server-side request forgery (SSRF) attacks via vectors related to a DTD.

criterions.comment: jackson-dataformat-xml package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.5-1').
